*adds to list of things to do when 0.22 is released*
You probably shouldn't tell what happens in the movie, that is very much a spoiler.
Yeah. For god sake, the movie is just out. You can't do these things. It's not fair to other people who haven't watched the movie.
Lol, doesn't everything explode or fall apart in movies these days???
There isn't a whole lot of plot to spoil really. It's all about thrills, intense visuals, and atmosphere (not the gassy kind, well, yes the gassy kind too but you know what I mean).
This movie was great. Go see it, all of you.

You see it in the trailer.

It's not that big a surprise.

You see a station falling. You can't tell which one is it, and yes, it is a huge spoiler. Not cool, man. Not cool.

Edited October 7, 2013 by lajoswinkler

There isn't a whole lot of plot to spoil really. It's all about thrills, intense visuals, and atmosphere.

There's not a big plot to spoil but there is a lot to spoil, since Dr. Stone's character growth is immense and powerful.

On topic, the track actually came up randomly a few minutes ago...

Sorry guys, I haven't seen this either, so I've cut it at the request of others...
